thread.title: Meet Sylvester Stallone’s three model daughters aka this year’s Miss Golden Globes
thread.title_full: Meet Sylvester Stallone’s three model daughters aka this year’s Miss Golden Globes

author: Johnni Macke
title: Meet Sylvester Stallone’s three model daughters aka this year’s Miss Golden Globes
text:
Meet Sylvester Stallone’s three model daughters aka this year’s Miss Golden Globes The Golden Globes are almost here and we are so excited! Ahead of this weekend’s award show, meet Sylvester Stallone’s three daughters who are this year’s Miss Golden Globe.
Yes, there are three Miss Golden Globe ladies this year and they are all daughters of the Rocky actor . Sophia, Sistine and Scarlet will be the gorgeous women standing on stage and giving out the coveted Golden Globe statues this Sunday and we’ve got all the information about them that you could need.
Sophia Stallone Meet Sophia, she is the oldest of the Stallone sisters and is 20 years old.
satisfying my coffee addiction @ Smashbox Studios 
A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Dec 22, 2016 at 7:01pm PST 
Sophia attends the University of Southern California and is a member of the Kappa Kappa Gamma sorority.
✌ 
A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Sep 10, 2016 at 4:08pm PDT 
According to The Hollywood Reporter , the eldest Stallone daughter just switched her major to Communications after originally studying Art History.
twenty years young 
A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Aug 27, 2016 at 3:47pm PDT 
She is all about college life and is constantly living it up in California.
"bae watching" 
A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Sep 24, 2016 at 5:14pm PDT 
When she isn’t in school or at home, Sophia is always traveling and we are so jealous.

A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Jul 19, 2016 at 10:41am PDT 
The 20-year-old student is best friends with her sisters, especially Sistine, who she loves spending time with.
my #1 
A photo posted by SOPHIA STALLONE (@sophiastallone) on Nov 12, 2016 at 11:09am PST 
“I want to be an entrepreneur and run my own fashion and makeup line,” Sophia told The Hollywood Reporter . “I think today it’s all about digital and social media, and so being recognized is a huge asset. Like, Kylie Jenner Lip Kit is blowing up. So getting my face out there is a big part of it.” Sistine Stallone This is Sistine, she is 18 years old.

A photo posted by SISTINE STALLONE (@sistinestallone) on Dec 23, 2016 at 4:22pm PST 
The middle Stallone sister is already in the limelight as a model.
Strictly business 
A photo posted by SISTINE STALLONE (@sistinestallone) on Oct 6, 2016 at 9:15pm PDT 
She’s followed in her mother’s footsteps by signing with IMG Models in 2016.
castings on castings 
A photo posted by SISTINE STALLONE (@sistinestallone) on Jun 8, 2016 at 11:46am PDT 
Sistine has walked a LOT of catwalks and covered a few magazines already and she’s just getting started.
Had so much fun working on the June shoot for @express !! 
A photo posted by SISTINE STALLONE (@sistinestallone) on Jun 16, 2016 at 11:23am PDT 
“As for me, I don’t think I could ever act. I’m good for modeling because I don’t have to talk,” Sistine told the publication. “[Acting] is something you’re born with. My mother is a model. I have dreamed about being a model since I was a little girl. Scarlet Stallone Meet Scarlet, she’s 14 years old and the youngest sister.
With Soph at @ysl 
A photo posted by Scarlet Stallone (@scarletstallone) on Dec 23, 2016 at 3:53pm PST 
Unlike her big sisters, Scarlet is still deciding what she wants to do in life…she’s only in middle school!
55〽️ 
A photo posted by Scarlet Stallone (@scarletstallone) on Jul 13, 2016 at 4:51am PDT 
Scarlet is the athletic one of the bunch running track and field at St.Paul the Apostle School in Westwood, California.

A photo posted by Scarlet Stallone (@scarletstallone) on Jun 17, 2016 at 4:00pm PDT 
When she’s not at school she’s goofing off with her friends.
happy birthday ri love you 
A photo posted by Scarlet Stallone (@scarletstallone) on Nov 27, 2016 at 12:51pm PST 
Or tanning. She lives in California what did you expect?
With my laba! 
A photo posted by Scarlet Stallone (@scarletstallone) on Apr 8, 2015 at 11:28am PDT 
While the girls clearly have a lot to look forward to in their futures, right now they are completely focused on being Miss Golden Globe.
Come on, it’s clearly going to be an amazing show with these beauties and host Jimmy Fallon.
Tommaso Boddi/WireImage/Getty Images Tune into the Golden Globes on Sunday at 5 p.m. PST on NBC.
